mapper.sql: select place_id, place_code, place_name, place_alias_name, place_type, place_linkman, place_tel, place_email, place_open_bank, place_bank_account, place_star_level, place_status, regist_time, user_id, is_delete, remark, create_time, create_by, update_by, update_time, user_name from business_place

select t.place_id, t.place_code, t.place_name, t.place_alias_name, t.place_type, t.place_linkman, t.place_tel, t.place_email, t.place_open_bank, t.place_bank_account, t.place_star_level, t.place_status, t.regist_time, t.user_id, t.is_delete, t.remark, t.create_time, t.create_by, t.update_by, t.update_time, t.user_name, A.agency_fee_id, A.place_code, A.special_invoice6, A.special_invoice13, A.special_self_fee, A.is_special_tax, A.ordinary_self_fee, A.ordinary_proxy_fee, A.is_ordinary_tax, A.is_delete, A.create_time, A.create_by, A.update_by, A.update_time, A.special_invoice6_money, A.special_invoice13_money, A.ordinary_proxy_money, A.special_proxy_fee, A.special_proxy_money, A.ordinary_tax, A.ordinary_special_tax, A.ordinary_share, A.ordinary_share_money, A.special_share, A.special_share_money, A.is_self_tax, A.is_special_self_tax, A.ordinary_proxy_ismoney, A.special_proxy_ismoney, A.ordinary_share_ismoney, A.special_share_ismoney, A.is_ordinary_share, A.is_special_share, A.is_slider, A.is_slider_ordinary, A.self_share,A.is_self_share,A.self_share_ismoney,A.is_register_money, A.is_disposable, A.disposable_share, A.disposable_share_ismoney, A.is_disposable_share, A.disposable_fee, A.disposable_fee_ismoney,A.disposable_remark from business_place t LEFT JOIN business_agency_fee ON t.place_code=A.place_code
mapper.insert:
insert into business_place
place_code, place_name, place_alias_name, place_type, place_linkman, place_tel, place_email, place_open_bank, place_bank_account, place_star_level, place_status, regist_time, user_id, is_delete, remark, create_time, create_by, update_by, update_time, user_name,
#{placeCode}, #{placeName}, #{placeAliasName}, #{placeType}, #{placeLinkman}, #{placeTel}, #{placeEmail}, #{placeOpenBank}, #{placeBankAccount}, #{placeStarLevel}, #{placeStatus}, #{registTime}, #{userId}, #{isDelete}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{userName},
mapper.delete:
delete from business_place where place_id in
#{placeId}
mapper.update:
update business_place set is_delete=0 where place_id in
#{placeId}
